title: Measure metric: length 2: a thousand clicks
brief_description: Demonstrates how to measure circular objects and record the answers using decimal notation, how to measure lengths that are more than one metre, and how to use the trundle wheel to measure a kilometre. Suitable for middle and upper primary levels.
